channel.title: Opengl on JAKOBS BLOG

item.title: Rendering the Buddhabrot with WebGL
item.description: Introduction I finally decided to make my first web application. Since I am a c++ guy I wanted to use this little project to learn js,html etc, so if you encounter some stupid/noobish js usage/style pls let me know so I can improve. If you don’t know what a Buddhbrot is I will give you a overview: The Buddhabrot is really cool mathematical object which somewhat looks like a Buddha:
